item.description:
Let's join Margaret and our friends from Party Express at the Old Grove in West Haven for another summer concert featuring the band "Bennie and the Jets" as they entertain us with the sounds of Elton John . For those of you who attended the Branford Festival or the Hamden Concerts, KNOW this will be SUMMERTIME FUN at its best. All you NEED to bring is yourself and a chair or blanket but feel free to pack a picnic or make a stop at Jimmies before the show it doesnt get any easier..

Join US for a night of FUN !! The concert is free, parking is plentiful and you'll be sure to have a great time.

http://www.cityofwest...

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Bennie & the Jets @ Old Grove Park West Haven
